description: Gets the Stages for an API.

nested_items.name: Items
nested_items.description: The elements from this collection.

nested_items.name: AccessLogSettings
nested_items.description: Settings for logging access in this stage.

nested_items.name: DestinationArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the CloudWatch Logs log group to receive access logs.

nested_items.name: Format
nested_items.description: A single line format of the access logs of data, as specified by selected $context variables. The format must include at least $context.requestId.

nested_items.name: ApiGatewayManaged
nested_items.description: Specifies whether a stage is managed by API Gateway. If you created an API using quick create, the $default stage is managed by API Gateway. You can't modify the $default stage.

nested_items.name: AutoDeploy
nested_items.description: Specifies whether updates to an API automatically trigger a new deployment. The default value is false.

nested_items.name: ClientCertificateId
nested_items.description: The identifier of a client certificate for a Stage. Supported only for WebSocket APIs.

nested_items.name: CreatedDate
nested_items.description: The timestamp when the stage was created.

nested_items.name: DefaultRouteSettings
nested_items.description: Default route settings for the stage.

nested_items.name: DataTraceEnabled
nested_items.description: Specifies whether (true) or not (false) data trace logging is enabled for this route. This property affects the log entries pushed to Amazon CloudWatch Logs. Supported only for WebSocket APIs.

nested_items.name: DetailedMetricsEnabled
nested_items.description: Specifies whether detailed metrics are enabled.

nested_items.name: LoggingLevel
nested_items.description: Specifies the logging level for this route: INFO, ERROR, or OFF. This property affects the log entries pushed to Amazon CloudWatch Logs. Supported only for WebSocket APIs.

nested_items.name: ThrottlingBurstLimit
nested_items.description: Specifies the throttling burst limit.

nested_items.name: ThrottlingRateLimit
nested_items.description: Specifies the throttling rate limit.

nested_items.name: DeploymentId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the Deployment that the Stage is associated with. Can't be updated if autoDeploy is enabled.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description of the stage.

nested_items.name: LastDeploymentStatusMessage
nested_items.description: Describes the status of the last deployment of a stage. Supported only for stages with autoDeploy enabled.

nested_items.name: LastUpdatedDate
nested_items.description: The timestamp when the stage was last updated.

nested_items.name: RouteSettings
nested_items.description: Route settings for the stage, by routeKey.

nested_items.name: DataTraceEnabled
nested_items.description: (string) ---

nested_items.name: DataTraceEnabled
nested_items.description: Specifies whether (true) or not (false) data trace logging is enabled for this route. This property affects the log entries pushed to Amazon CloudWatch Logs. Supported only for WebSocket APIs.

nested_items.name: DetailedMetricsEnabled
nested_items.description: Specifies whether detailed metrics are enabled.

nested_items.name: LoggingLevel
nested_items.description: Specifies the logging level for this route: INFO, ERROR, or OFF. This property affects the log entries pushed to Amazon CloudWatch Logs. Supported only for WebSocket APIs.

nested_items.name: ThrottlingBurstLimit
nested_items.description: Specifies the throttling burst limit.

nested_items.name: ThrottlingRateLimit
nested_items.description: Specifies the throttling rate limit.

nested_items.name: StageName
nested_items.description: The name of the stage.

nested_items.name: StageVariables
nested_items.description: A map that defines the stage variables for a stage resource. Variable names can have alphanumeric and underscore characters, and the values must match [A-Za-z0-9-._~:/?#&=,]+.
(string) ---
(string) ---
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The next page of elements from this collection. Not valid for the last element of the collection.
